collation.references: Grundy: The Concise Oriya-English Dictionary ISBN:8120616995
collation.cr: [normalization on] [reorder Orya Deva Beng Guru Gujr Taml Telu Knda Mlym Sinh] # # The following tailoring is an adjustment of the # DUCET collation order for CANDRABINDU, ANUSVARA, # and VISARGA. Instead of being sorted with secondary # weights, they are collated on primary level between # the independent vowels and the consonants. # &ଔ<ଁ<ଂ<ଃ # KSSA is sorted after HA. &ହ<କ୍ଷ # YYA is secondary different from YA. &ଯ<<ୟ
